name: Harper Lee
bio: Harper Lee was an American novelist widely known for To Kill a Mockingbird.

name: George Orwell
bio: George Orwell was an English novelist, essayist, journalist, and critic.

name: Jane Austen
bio: Jane Austen was an English novelist known primarily for her six major novels.

name: F. Scott Fitzgerald
bio: F. Scott Fitzgerald was an American novelist and short story writer.

name: Herman Melville
bio: Herman Melville was an American novelist, short story writer, and poet.

name: Leo Tolstoy
bio: Leo Tolstoy was a Russian writer who is regarded as one of the greatest authors of all time.

name: J.D. Salinger
bio: J.D. Salinger was an American writer known for his widely read novel, The Catcher in the Rye.

name: J.R.R. Tolkien
bio: J.R.R. Tolkien was an English writer, poet, philologist, and academic.

name: J.K. Rowling
bio: J.K. Rowling is a British author, best known for writing the Harry Potter fantasy series.
